children.name:
asyncio.exceptions.TimeoutError: Timed out waiting for model:
mysql-test-app/0 [idle] waiting:
test_build_and_deploy
tags: @pytest.mark.skipif(False, reason='Skips juju <3.1.x as we have a dependency for self-signed-certificates')

children.name:
AssertionError: None of the units are upgraded
assert '+testupgrade' in 'Model  Controller          Cloud/Region        Version  SLA          Timestamp
test   microk8s-localhost  microk8s/localhost  3.4.3    unsupported  02:28:01Z

App               Version                  Status   Scale  Charm             Channel      Rev  Address         Exposed  Message
mysql-k8s         8.0.37-0ubuntu0.22.04.3  active       1  mysql-k8s         8.0/edge     182  10.152.183.189  no       
mysql-router-k8s  8.0.37-0ubuntu0.22.04.3  waiting      3  mysql-router-k8s  8.0/edge       0  10.152.183.136  no       installing agent
mysql-test-app    0.0.2                    active       1  mysql-test-app    latest/edge   51  10.152.183.51   no       

Unit                 Workload     Agent  Address     Ports  Message
mysql-k8s/0*         active       idle   10.1.91.13         Primary
mysql-router-k8s/0   active       idle   10.1.91.9          Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+70d6969
mysql-router-k8s/1*  active       idle   10.1.91.11         Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+70d6969
mysql-router-k8s/2   maintenance  idle   10.1.91.14         
mysql-test-app/0*    active       idle   10.1.91.8          
'
 +  where 'Model  Controller          Cloud/Region        Version  SLA          Timestamp

App               Version                  Status   Scale  Charm             Channel      Rev  Address         Exposed  Message
mysql-k8s         8.0.37-0ubuntu0.22.04.3  active       1  mysql-k8s         8.0/edge     182  10.152.183.189  no       
mysql-router-k8s  8.0.37-0ubuntu0.22.04.3  waiting      3  mysql-router-k8s  8.0/edge       0  10.152.183.136  no       installing agent
mysql-test-app    0.0.2                    active       1  mysql-test-app    latest/edge   51  10.152.183.51   no       

Unit                 Workload     Agent  Address     Ports  Message
mysql-k8s/0*         active       idle   10.1.91.13         Primary
mysql-router-k8s/0   active       idle   10.1.91.9          Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+70d6969
mysql-router-k8s/1*  active       idle   10.1.91.11         Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+70d6969
mysql-router-k8s/2   maintenance  idle   10.1.91.14         
mysql-test-app/0*    active       idle   10.1.91.8          
' = get_juju_status('test')
 +    where 'test' = <juju.model.Model object at 0x7f9df56d3970>.name
 +      where <juju.model.Model object at 0x7f9df56d3970> = <pytest_operator.plugin.OpsTest object at 0x7f9df5258e50>.model
